title: Always Green Turf AZ Revolutionizes Outdoor Spaces with
text: Always Green Turf AZ Revolutionizes Outdoor Spaces with Superior Synthetic Grass Solutions Always Green Turf AZ continues to redefine outdoor landscaping with their state-of-the-art synthetic grass and fake grass [https://www.alwaysgreenturfaz.com/#:~:text=YARD%20FROM%20LIFELESS%2C-,FAKE%20GRASS,-TO%20A%20VIBRANT] installation services. Homeowners and businesses alike are discovering the transformative power of synthetic grass installation, a solution that promises not only aesthetic beauty but also practical benefits. This company has successfully done fake grass installation in a variety of settings, including commercial properties, sports fields, playgrounds, and rooftop gardens. The Rise of Fake Grass In recent years, fake grass has gained tremendous popularity. This surge can be attributed to the numerous advantages it offers over traditional lawns. This company is at the forefront of this revolution, providing high-quality synthetic grass that mimics the look and feel of natural grass without the associated maintenance hassles. Benefits of Synthetic Grass One of the primary reasons for the shift towards synthetic grass is water conservation. With droughts becoming more frequent and severe, maintaining a natural lawn can be both challenging and costly. Their synthetic grass solutions help conserve water, reducing utility bills and promoting environmental sustainability. Additionally, synthetic grass remains lush and green year-round, regardless of weather conditions, ensuring a consistently beautiful outdoor space. Another significant benefit is the reduction of maintenance efforts and costs. Traditional lawns require regular mowing, fertilizing, and pest control. In contrast, fake grass requires minimal upkeep, freeing up time and resources for other activities. This low-maintenance aspect is particularly appealing to busy homeowners and business owners looking to enhance their curb appeal without the ongoing investment of time and money. Superior Synthetic Grass Installation Always Green Turf AZ prides itself on delivering top-notch synthetic grass [https://www.alwaysgreenturfaz.com/#:~:text=wherever%20else%20green-,synthetic%20grass,-is%20needed.%20Our] installation services. The company's team of skilled professionals ensures that every installation is executed with precision and attention to detail. From initial consultation to final installation, they are committed to providing a seamless experience for their clients. The process begins with a thorough assessment of the site, taking into consideration factors such as soil type, drainage, and intended use of the space. This ensures that the synthetic grass installation is tailored to meet the specific needs and preferences of each client. Always Green Turf AZ uses only the highest quality materials, guaranteeing durability and longevity. Versatile Applications The applications of synthetic grass extend far beyond residential lawns. This company has successfully done fake grass installation [https://www.google.com/maps?q=fake+grass+installation&cid=5962544020660156128] in a variety of settings, including commercial properties, sports fields, playgrounds, and rooftop gardens. Each installation is customized to suit the unique requirements of the space, ensuring optimal performance and aesthetic appeal. For commercial properties, synthetic grass offers a pristine, inviting appearance that can enhance the overall image of the business. It is also an ideal solution for sports fields, providing a safe and durable surface for athletic activities. Playgrounds benefit from the soft, cushioned feel of synthetic grass, offering a safer environment for children to play. Additionally, rooftop gardens and terraces can be transformed into lush, green retreats, providing a relaxing escape in urban settings. Customer Satisfaction at the Core At the heart of Always Green Turf AZ's success is their unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction. The company's team works closely with clients throughout the entire process, ensuring that their vision is brought to life. This customer-centric approach has earned them a reputation for excellence and a loyal client base. The Future of Landscaping As the demand for sustainable and low-maintenance landscaping solutions continues to grow, this company is poised to lead the way. The company is constantly innovating, exploring new technologies and techniques to enhance their synthetic grass offerings. Their dedication to quality and customer satisfaction ensures that they remain at the forefront of the industry. Get in Touch For those interested in transforming their outdoor spaces with fake grass or synthetic grass installation [https://www.alwaysgreenturfaz.com], they offer comprehensive consultations. Their team is ready to answer any questions and provide expert advice tailored to individual needs. With Always Green Turf AZ, achieving a beautiful, low-maintenance lawn has never been easier. To learn more about them and their synthetic grass solutions, visit Always Green Turf AZ. Experience the benefits of fake grass and synthetic grass installation, and discover why this is the trusted choice for homeowners and businesses across Phoenix and beyond. author: Estelle Greeff
title: Government Communications warns public about severe weather predictions
text:
Public notice: Severe weather and need for public to take precautions
The South African Weather Service has issued severe weather alerts including severe thunderstorms, damaging and strong winds, and disruptive rains in the Provinces of Western Cape, Eastern Cape, Northern Cape, KwaZulu-Natal, North West and Free State. Government is urging residents in these Provinces to take precautions and follow instructions from respective Disaster Management Centres to keep safe. The contact numbers of the relevant provincial Disaster Management Centres are:
- • Eastern Cape: Mabandla P. – 071 604 3160
- • Northern Cape: Gaolaolwe T. – 083 390 2920
- • Western Cape: Diener C. – 082 550 6770
- • KwaZulu-Natal: Ngema S. – 066 475 2308
- • North West: Mutloane D. – 066 030 8026
- • Free State: Butler F. – 066 487 4896
National Disaster Management Centre: Dr. Elias Sithole: 082 490 9825
Government has noted the damages already caused by the inclement weather and the responses of first responders in the Provinces of KwaZulu-Natal, Gauteng, Mpumalanga and Limpopo.
The National Disaster Management Centre is supporting all Provincial and Municipal Disaster Management Centres to assist the affected communities.
We all have the responsibility to assist government and disaster managers keep us safe.
Weather warnings are available at
https://www.weathersa.co.za/home/warnings
Media enquiries:
Ms Nomonde Mnukwa
Acting Government Spokesperson
Mobile: 083 653 7486

author: konde1313
title: #25 Gobernando el PP en 2001 a estos jueces conservadores les parecía intolerable que el CGPJ llevase 2 MESES sin renovar
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
Solamente van a por su propio interés, descaradamente. TODO lo que dicen son excusas fabricadas para el caso concreto.
Ta están atacando otra vez a la independencia de los jueces estos rojos masones. Independencia para defender hoy una cosa y mañana la contraria según les convenga.
[#5](c5#c-5) Eso es una burla a la democracia. Los órganos de gobierno del poder judicial deben representar, al igual que el parlamento, las proporciones ideológicas votadas por el pueblo de cuya soberanía emana el poder. Cada vez está más claro que el poder judicial en España es bastante poco democrático. Atado y bien atado.
[#9](c9#c-9) Eso es una barbaridad. Es como si los políticos también decidieran elegirse entre ellos. Lo veríamos algo absolutamente intolerable, una propuesta golpista. El poder judicial no es un poder diferente ni del legislativo, ni del ejecutivo. En estos momentos, los jueces que dirigen los órganos del poder judicial son usurpadores y deberíamos tratarlos como a tales.
[#22](c22#c-22) Es una idea que han propuesto algunos que no tiene ni pies ni cabeza.
Artículo 1 de la Constitución Española:
2. La soberanía nacional reside en el pueblo español, del que emanan los poderes del Estado.
Si el poder judicial se eligiera a si mismo, dejaría de emanar del pueblo español y, por lo tanto, sería contrario a la Constitución.
[#11](c11#c-11) El poder ejecutivo es elegido por el Parlamento, que a su vez es el poder legislativo. Es de pura lógica, por lo tanto, que la distribución del poder judicial sea acorde a esta. Y ya. Todas las demás propuestas que no tienen otro objetivo, más o menos declarado, que mantener un poder conservador en los órganos de poder judiciales independientemente de la voluntad popular son ajenas al espíritu de la Constitución que la derecha tantísimo dice amar y respetar.
En serio al PP le merece la pena quemar de esta manera a la judicatura para salvar el culo de sus corruptos, pero si ellos son ya el "nuevo PP" 100% corruption free.
Ya se desmarcaron de la chusma ladrona que trajo Aznar, que importa que los encierren, si ellos ya no tienen nada que ver
[#7](c7#c-7) Si hubiese una judicatura digna, mañana mismo estaban encerrados todos los corruptos, hasta el ilocalizable M. Rajoy.
Yo, honestamente, no estoy de acuerdo en que los políticos sean los que elijan a los jueces porque cada legislatura sería un cachondeo poniendo jueces de tu cuerda. En ese sentido me gusta más el sistema de USA de que sea vitalicio porque dejarían de tener que preocuparse de las repercusiones de sus actos con respecto al que mande cada vez. Sería complicado cómo elegirles, eso sí.
Por otro lado a ver si podéis responderme: ¿es cierto que si ahora mismo el PSOE quisiera podría iniciar la renovación proponiendo candidatos desde el Congreso y el Senado?. Porque en caso de que sea así lo que está claro es que no les interesa porque no saldría lo que ellos quisieran, y lo mismo ocurría en su momento con el PP y estarían diciendo lo mismo los del lado contrario.
¿No se supone que desde la UE les han dicho que se pongan las pilas?. Mira que la política siempre me interesó lo justo pero entre unos y otros han conseguido que, a día de hoy, mi interés sea nulo.

author: Michael Potuck
title: Verizon announces price bump – plans increasing by $4 per line - 9to5Mac
text: Verizon has announced that it’s raising the price of its plans in early 2024. The latest price bump will see “an increased rate of $4/mo per phone line.” Follow along for all the details including which plans are impacted and how Verizon says it’s “giving you more.” Verizon started emailing customers titled “An important account update” and published a FAQ on its website . The carrier says there’s “no action needed” and that the price bump is to help with “improving our industry-leading mobile network and services…” When is the Verizon price bump? - “No sooner than 3.1.24, you’ll see an increased rate of $4/mo per phone line.” For what plans? Verizon’s FAQ says these plans will see the increase: - Play More Unlimited, Do More Unlimited, Get More Unlimited - Play More Unlimited 5G Ultra Wideband, Do More Unlimited 5G Ultra Wideband, Get More Unlimited 5G Ultra Wideband - 5G Start, 5G Play More, 5G Do More, 5G Get More What else is happening? - Verizon highlights that it’s “giving you more” with a bonus 5GB of extra hotspot data. - Verizon says included benefits like streaming perks and more are NOT changing Ways to save Verizon’s email ends with a section on “ways to save.” It highlights any existing discounts will remain intact and encourages customers to keep an eye on the “My offers” section. Here’s the full email going out to customers and check out the FAQ for more specifics: FTC: We use income earning auto affiliate links. More. our homepage for all the latest news, and follow 9to5Mac on exclusive stories , reviews , how-tos , and subscribe to our YouTube channel

author: Adam Stites
title: Jaguars vs. Panthers injury report: Trevor Lawrence sits out Thursday
text:
Jacksonville Jaguars quarterback Trevor Lawrence missed another practice Thursday, casting doubt about his chances at playing through a shoulder injury Sunday against the Carolina Panthers.
Lawrence, 24, was listed as the Jaguars’ only non-participant. Another seven players were limited, nearly mirroring the team’s injury report Wednesday. The only difference is rookie cornerback Christian Braswell was no longer on the report after reverting to the injured reserve.
Thursday Injury Report pic.twitter.com/E2F8UNaYP1
— Jacksonville Jaguars (@Jaguars) December 28, 2023
Earlier in the day Thursday, Jaguars coach Doug Pederson told reporters that Lawrence would likely be limited and “go through our individual portion.”
The third-year quarterback has never missed a game in his NFL career, but has questionable a few times in 2023 due to knee and ankle injuries, as well as a stint last week in the NFL’s concussion protocol.
The Panthers have a lengthier injury report, although seven players were listed as full participants Thursday.
#CARvsJAX Thursday injury report… pic.twitter.com/aIg0MQZTUo
— Adam Caplan (@caplannfl) December 28, 2023
The most significant issue for the Panthers is the health of their secondary with cornerbacks Jaycee Horn and Troy Hill both missing another practice.
Articles NFL Week 17 best bets: One wager to make for every team Doug Pederson: Jaguars 'still locked in and focused,' not tuned out Jaguars reveal uniform combination for Week 17 vs. Panthers

author: VNExplorer
title: Delhi Airport Diverts 10 Flights Due To Heavy Rainfall
text: The national capital experienced significant rainfall, leading to waterlogging and traffic jams in various areas. (Photo: India TV News) At least 10 flights that were to land at the Delhi airport were diverted on Wednesday evening due to heavy rains in the national capital. An official said that at least 10 flights were diverted at the airport after 1930 hours due to bad weather. Of these, eight were diverted to Jaipur and two flights to Lucknow. The national capital witnessed heavy rains that also caused waterlogging and traffic congestion in several areas. On social media platform X, airlines said that flights might get affected due to the bad weather. Vistara said flight UK998 from Pune to Delhi has been diverted to Lucknow due to bad weather at the Delhi airport. Flights to and from Delhi may get affected due to bad weather this evening. “Guests are advised to start early for the airport, as slow traffic and waterlogging may delay movement”, Air India said. SpiceJet said that due to “bad weather (heavy rain) in Delhi (DEL), all departures/arrivals and their consequential flights may get affected”. “We have a special announcement straight from the heavenly skies! The rain gods have decided to shower #Delhi with their blessings tonight. As a result, we’re expecting heavy rainfall throughout the night,” IndiGo said in a post on X and asked passengers to check the status of their flights.

author: AFP
title: Dos rusos fueron condenados por un poema hostil a la operación en Ucrania
text:
Casi Las 5 En vivo
Un tribunal de Moscú condenó este jueves a penas de entre cinco años y medio y siete de cárcel a dos poetas rusos que participaron en una lectura contra el conflicto de Ucrania, un ejemplo más de la represión presente en el país.
Miles de rusos, opositores o simples ciudadanos, fueron condenados por tribunales por criticar la ofensiva en Ucrania, iniciada en febrero de 2022, a veces con penas especialmente severas.
Según comprobó un periodista de AFP presente en la audiencia, los simpatizantes de Artiom Kamardin, de 33 años, y de Yegor Shtovba, de 23, gritaron "qué vergüenza" al anunciarse la decisión.
"Es de una arbitrariedad absoluta", exclamó el padre de Artiom Kamardin, Yuri. "Todo el mundo es igual ante la ley, pero algunos son más iguales que otros", ironizó su madre, Elena.
Al menos diez personas fueron detenidas por la policía delante del tribunal tras el juicio.
Artiom Kamardin y Yegor Shtovba fueron detenidos en septiembre de 2022 tras participar en una lectura pública en Moscú cerca del monumento al poeta Vladimir Maiakovski, punto de cita de disidentes desde la época soviética.
En esa lectura, Kamardin declamó un poema, "Mátame, miliciano", muy hostil a los separatistas prorrusos del este de Ucrania.
Al día siguiente fue detenido durante un allanamiento en su domicilio, en el que afirma que fue golpeado y violado por los policías con un aparato de halterofilia.
Los dos poetas fueron primero acusados de "incitación al odio", y luego inculpados también de "llamado público a cometer actividades contra la seguridad del Estado".
"No soy un héroe, y el ir a prisión por lo que pienso nunca formó parte de mis planes", dijo Kamardin en su alegato final ante la corte, publicado en Telegram por sus simpatizantes.
El acusado pidió al juez que lo dejara "regresar a casa" y a cambio, prometió distanciarse de cualquier "tema sensible".
Su esposa, Alexandra Popova, dijo a AFP estar indignada por la pena "tan severa" que se le impuso a su marido. "Siete años por una poesía, un delito no violento...", dijo.
"Si tuviéramos unos tribunales normales, esta situación no existiría", añadió, antes de ser llevada por la policía, junto a un amigo del poeta y dos periodistas.
Tres personas, incluido un periodista, seguían detenidos el jueves por la noche antes de una vista judicial, acusados de participar en un mitin, según el medio de comunicación independiente Sota.
La abogada del periodista detenidos indicó unas horas antes que estaban acusados de "alteración del orden público" y se enfrentaban a 30 días de cárcel.
Shtovba, condenado a cinco años y medio, insistió durante el juicio en que no vulneró la ley.
Un tercer poeta, Nikolai Daineko, detenido al mismo tiempo que los dos primeros, fue a su vez condenado a cuatro años de cárcel en mayo, según OVD-info.
El Ministerio alemán de Relaciones Exteriores condenó el veredicto y lamentó que la libertad de expresión esté "sofocada" en Rusia.
El poder ruso lleva años reprimiendo a las voces críticas, y la campaña se endureció desde el inicio de la ofensiva militar en Ucrania.
Según OVD-Info, cerca de 20.000 personas fueron detenidas en Rusia por su oposición al conflicto de Ucrania desde febrero de 2022.
La oenegé Memorial tiene contabilizados 633 prisioneros políticos entre rejas.
